txt.en: 'Those fools have hired a mercenary, an Uruk filth called Shatúrro. They say he has ties to Fushaum Tum! Take care of this pest for me!'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Note: This quest is only available while the quest, The Fushaum Resolution, is underway.</rgb>
'You've proven yourself to me again. Fushaum Tum will pay soon enough. I can feel its conquest ever closer!'
Fushaum Bal North: Shatúrro the Spear
Shatúrro can be found in Fushaum Bal South.\n\nYou should defeat Shatúrro.
Khirgi can be found at Fushaum Bal North.\n\nYou should talk to Khirgi.
The encampment of Fushaum Bal is a lawless home to evil men once under the command of Sauron.
